name: torch
desc: A lit torch to help you see

name: key
desc: A key to a door you do not know

name: ruby necklace
desc: A a beautiful necklace adorned with a gorgeous ruby.

name: steel shield
desc: A large shield that can withstand heavy blows

name: coin
desc: A coin that seems to be older than the castle and from a land you don't know.

name: note
desc: A note warning you that this castle is not what it seems.

name: wine
desc: An ancient brand of wine that you wonder might still be good.

name: portrait
desc: A large painting of someone of prominence

name: tobacco
desc: How long have people been smoking?!!?

name: emblem
desc: An emblem similar to your own but much older.

name: mace
desc: A mace with a nice and sturdy handle that can do some real damage.
